ygData.subject: RE: PoF and bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is a pain/risky to mez stuff, and i definatly see that effect where its hard to start the mez on something. It mostly depends on the target and whether
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:17 AM 10/31/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i haven't tried pixie strike in PoF yet. this message just came through a
>couple weeks old hehe, and since then we have all been seeing how the song
>is broken. by the time you can get it to stick you'll be at your bind
>point. i asked another level 50 bard up there once if he thought we should
>use it, as i read about bards in PoF using it successfully, but as it was so
>tough to get to work we decided not to bother. so other than pixie strike,
>i use the same songs you do.
>

It is a pain/risky to mez stuff, and i definatly see that effect where its
hard to start the mez on something. It mostly depends on the target and
whether or not an enchanter is handy to start laying tashan down. Fiends,
Toads i can mez with little or no trouble, enchanter or not. Scarelings,
Boogymen, Gorgons, Phantasms, Frightfingers,warrriors i can mez but they
wake up a lot, though its still worth it imo to mez them. Tashan helps a
lot here i have found. With the lvl 44 tashan, i can mez even knights and
worry wraiths.


Anyways, PoF is basically done for me, i have nothing left in the zone i
want (minus any new items that might pop up after the recent itemization).
Well exceppting cazic's flute, but the first time we killed cazic we got 8
plat. Second time we got puppet strings and a ruby crown (just worth money) :(

And they always reset the server before he spawns, so we dont get to kill
him nearly often as we would like.

Course the poh just opened, and we are doing that now. Maestro needs to
die, bastard just ate me again lol. Course he had a mace :/

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 45 Necromancer
Tunare
